body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Mark Thomas and I work for Blissful Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Barbara Evans.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Barbara. How can I assist you today? Are you currently staying at one of our hotels?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I am staying at the Blissful Hotel in downtown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Can you please confirm your room number and the number of clean towels you require?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am in room two two one and I need three clean towels.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, Barbara. I have noted your room number and your request for three clean towels. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Barbara. I will ensure your request is taken care of promptly. Have a pleasant stay and thank you for your time. Goodbye.
